text: Enugu is one of the 36 states of Nigeria. The capital is Enugu. The State has 17 Local Government Areas as follows: * Aninri * Awgu * Enugu East * Enugu North * Enugu South * Ezeagu * Igbo Etiti * Igbo Eze North * Igbo Eze South * Isi Uzo * Nkanu East * Nkanu West * Nsukka * Oji River * Udenu * Udi * Uzo- Uwani == References ==
title: Enugu State
